change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescripts of manuscripts, photographs, correspondence, a diary from Yalta to Iceland, maps, travel brochures, postcards and other memorabilia from Robinson's 1962 and 1964 railway trips in the Soviet Union. Includes typescripts of the original and final versions of his book, Americanski Journalist, four photographs used in the book, correspondence with friends, travel agents, and Intourist.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in English; some items are in Japanese and Russian.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Paper Relating to Americanski Journalist (MS 109). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescripts of manuscripts, photographs, correspondence, a diary from Yalta to Iceland, maps, travel brochures, postcards and other memorabilia from Robinson's 1962 and 1964 railway trips in the Soviet Union. Includes typescripts of the original and final versions of his book, Americanski Journalist, four photographs used in the book, correspondence with friends, travel agents, and Intourist. Also includes material on Japan, Finland, Iceland, and the Danube.

relatedmaterial.p: Americanski Journalist: Ten Thousand Miles of Russia through the Eyes of an American Observer was published by Westernlore Press, Los Angeles, in 1969.
